sub_title: Wholesale Telecommunication expert / Sales enthusiast / Passionate about people and business
summary:
Business manager with 13 years of expertise in creating and deploying sales strategy and operations. Total of 23 years of experience in the telco industry. 
Excellent results in generating new business, expanding the market and growing sales. Client focused with recognized success in delivering creative custom-made solutions. Result oriented, creative, dynamic, flexible, enthusiastic, responsible, self-motivated and resilient, with excellent communication and negotiation skills. Team player and leader capable to motivate the team to deliver the best results.
 
Experienced, passionate and dedicated, communicative, with demonstrated strength to initiate, analyze, consolidate and make a success. High capability to launch and generate new businesses and new business’ relations.

-Efficiency and result-driven, creative and ambitious
-Hardworking and always willing to go the extra mile.  
-Team leader, manager, with  positive energy and creative spirit
-Recognized on the market as a flexible, efficient and somebody to relay-on
